description: This Java class defines the entity model for a grievance or ticket linked to passenger bookings in an airport facility service platform. It maps the GrievanceEntity to the 'grievances' table in a database, including fields like ID, passenger ID, booking ID, category, subject, description, priority, status, assigned admin, resolution, and timestamps.

classes.name: GrievanceEntity
classes.description: JPA entity representing passenger grievances linked to bookings, including fields for complaint details, status, resolution, and timestamps.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the grievance.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the grievance.

methods.name: getPassengerId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the passenger associated with the grievance.

methods.name: setPassengerId
methods.description: Sets the UUID for the passenger associated with the grievance.

methods.name: getBookingId
methods.description: Returns the booking UUID linked to the grievance.

methods.name: setBookingId
methods.description: Sets the booking UUID linked to the grievance.

methods.name: getCategory
methods.description: Returns the category of the grievance.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the category of the grievance.

methods.name: getSubject
methods.description: Returns the subject/title of the grievance.

methods.name: setSubject
methods.description: Sets the subject/title of the grievance.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the detailed description of the grievance.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the detailed description of the grievance.

methods.name: getPriority
methods.description: Returns the priority level of the grievance.

methods.name: setPriority
methods.description: Sets the priority level of the grievance.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the grievance.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Sets the current status of the grievance.

methods.name: getAssignedAdminId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the admin assigned to handle the grievance.

methods.name: setAssignedAdminId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the admin assigned to handle the grievance.

methods.name: getResolution
methods.description: Returns the resolution text for the grievance.

methods.name: setResolution
methods.description: Sets the resolution text for the grievance.

methods.name: getResolvedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the grievance was resolved.

methods.name: setResolvedAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp when the grievance was resolved.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the grievance was created.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp when the grievance was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the grievance was last updated.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp when the grievance was last updated.
